title: A boom in Earth observation satellites creating new demands for intelligence
summary: Crises such as the covid pandemic, climate change and the war in Ukraine are fueling demand for geospatial information

title: Capella raises $97 million to expand radar constellation
summary: Capella Space raised $97 million in a Series C investment round.

title: Orbital Insight brings Satellogic data into its platform
summary: Geospatial intelligence company Orbital Insight announced plans April 25 to bring high-resolution imagery from Satellogic, an Earth observation company based in Argentina, into its geospatial intelligence platform.

title: SpaceX’s private Dragon astronauts leave space station five days late
summary: Following extensive weather delays, a SpaceX Crew Dragon spacecraft has undocked from the International Space Station (ISS) after carrying the first all-private...

title: U.S. ASAT ban meant to support U.N. discussions on space threats
summary: A State Department official said the Biden administration’s announcement of a ban of one kind of ASAT weapon tests was timed to support discussions at an upcoming United Nations forum on norms of behavior in space.
